mapper.insert: insert into t_record(user_id, org_id, start_time, end_time, score, game_id,correct_num,error_num,game_time) values (#{userId}, #{orgId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{score}, #{gameId}, #{correctNum},#{errorNum}, #{gameTime})
mapper.select: select r.id rid, r.start_time gameDate, u.id uid, u.user_name userName, u.user_age userAge, u.user_gender userGender, u.user_edu_level userEduLevel, u.note note from t_record r, t_user u where r.user_id = u.id and r.org_id = #{orgId} group by uid
